protein.specific_function: Participates in chain elongation of fatty acids. Has no 2,4-dienoyl-CoA reductase activity.

reference.reference_text: Das AK, Uhler MD, Hajra AK: Molecular cloning and expression of mammalian peroxisomal trans-2-enoyl-coenzyme A reductase cDNAs. J Biol Chem. 2000 Aug 11;275(32):24333-40.
